What’s new in version 10.0.0
We have listened to your feedback and added various functions of the app including a brand new user interface. 

Here are some of the features you can look forward to:

• Snapshot View – Preview balances and accounts at a glance and see your last 5 transactions by clicking on the account in snapshot without the need for passwords 
• Select ATM PIN – Self-select or reset your PIN through the app
• Access to the brand new Citibank Dining program interface 

We are always working to improve the experience further and have more updates in the pipeline so please leave your feedback as we are always listening

We have listened to your feedback and added more functions to the app. 

Here are some of the features you can look forward to:

•Touch ID– iPhone 5S and above users can sign in using fingerprint authentication
•Real-time transactions – Credit Card transactions that have been authorised but not yet settled to your account will appear as pending
•Telegraphic Transfers – Transfer funds overseas to non Citi accounts

We are always working to improve the experience further and have more updates in the pipeline so please leave your feedback as we are always listening

Thank you for your feedback, we have listened and added more functions to the app. 

Here are some of the features you can look forward to:

Push notifications – Stay on top of your transactions and payments with notifications on your mobile. 
Card Activation – Instantly Activate your debit/ credit cards on the move. 

We are working to improve the experience further and have more updates in the pipeline so please leave your feedback as we are listening

What’s New
Thank you for your feedback, we have listened and added more functions to the app.
Here are some of the features you can look forward to:
Fixed Payment Option:
•Purchases – Ability to convert your unbilled purchases of $500 or more into fixed monthly instalments at a lower interest rate for a select term (eligibility criteria and T&Cs apply).
We are working to improve the experience further and have more updates in the pipeline so please leave your feedback as we are listening.

With this update, all Citi customers will now be able to enjoy the new Citi Mobile® App experience. Download or update your app now to check out the great new look and feel.

Enjoy the convenience of banking on the go with the Citi Mobile® App.

New for Credit Card only customers: 
• Easier access to your statements with our updated dashboard design.
• Reduce your Citi credit card balance by redeeming your Citi reward Points for statement credits on eligible purchases.
• Access and enjoy your Citi World Privileges directly from your Citi Mobile® App.

We are continuously working on improving the Citi Mobile® App and appreciate your feedback.

• Conveniently access and view your Lending account statements in the app.
• Share payments you have made in the app with friends or other payees, through our new payment confirmation share feature.

• Minor enhancements and bug fixes

Introducing New Payments Platform (NPP) - a fast, easy and secure payment service - to eligible Citi accounts.
• Create PayIDs using your mobile number or email address to receive fast payments in Real Time
• Make fast payments to another local eligible bank Account or PayID 

Presenting a new credit card feature, Citi PayAll, that allows you to make big ticket payments including rent, school fees, taxes and more from your credit card to a local eligible BSB and Account number.

Introducing a brand new Citi Mobile® App, designed with you in mind. The new and improved design features a faster and more intuitive navigation for a smarter mobile banking experience. 
 
Presenting:
• New Payments Platform (NPP) - a fast, easy and secure payment service to eligible Citi accounts.
• Citi PayAll, a new credit card feature that allows you to make big ticket payments including rent, school fees, taxes and more from your credit card to a local eligible BSB and Account number.

• Important compatibility and performance fixes
• Improved log in and forgot password process
• Enhancement to Payments & Transfers: No need to set up a new payee anymore - simply make a payment and save the payee after (not applicable for BPAY)
• Enhancement to Payments & Transfers: No need to set up a new payee anymore - simply make a payment and save the payee after (not applicable for BPAY)

• Add your eligible Citibank Debit Card to Apple Pay through the Citi Mobile® App and make fast and secure payments
• You can now view and update your residential and mailing address through the Citi Mobile® App. Update today by tapping on Profile & Settings > Personal Information
• Manage your credit limit: Credit Card, Ready Credit and Personal Loan Plus customers can now request changes to their credit limit in the Citi Mobile App

• A new optional Reference field introduced as part of the PayID and Osko payment flow. This field will provide Citi customers the option to include a unique identifier for example an invoice or payment number as part of the fast payment.
• Important compatibility and performance fixes
• Important compatibility fixes
